column1: Weighted MRI visualization size (256, 128, 1) in T2 of the skull of a man of 37 years old, with axial section n°112 starting at the base of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1033.5938 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4313.6719 mm³, the temporal horn of left lateral ventricle of volume 5.2734 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 765.9668 mm³, the left putamen of volume 3.9551 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 10.5469 mm³, the brainstem of volume 429.7852 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 257.0801 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 138.4277 mm³, the left ventral diencephalon of volume 104.1504 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1206.2988 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4140.9668 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 6.5918 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 1.3184 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 767.2852 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 228.0762 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 160.8398 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 108.1055 mm³.
